data.title: Domot - BBC News Pidgin
data.description: We dey give una latest tori on top politics, environment, business, sports, entertainment, health, fashion and all di oda things wey dey happen for West and Central Africa come add di rest of di world join. For better informate plus explanation of all di ogbonge tori wey pipo never hear about for inside West and Central Africa, BBC Pidgin dey serve am with video, audio, maps and oda graphics join.

summaries.title: Niger Delta leader Edwin Clark don die
summaries.description: One representative of di family, Prof. C. C. Clark announce di death of di former Federal Commissioner for Information and South-South leader on Tuesday, 18 February.
summaries.imageAlt: Edwin Clark for one interview wit BBC Pidgin for 2021

summaries.title: Passengers tok wetin dia eye see di moment Delta Air Lines plane crash  and turn upside down for Toronto
summaries.description: Witnesses speak about di moment di plane wey dem bin dey fly in overturn for Toronto.
summaries.imageAlt: Emergency responder stand next to di aircraft for di runway afta e crash for Toronto Pearson International Airport

summaries.title: Nigeria goment give details about first batch of deportees from US wey dem dey expect
summaries.description: About  201 Nigerians currently dey detained for US immigration centres, and about 85 of dem don dey cleared for deportation according to Nigeria Minister of State for Foreign Affairs Bianca Odumegwu Ojukwu,
summaries.imageAlt: File picture of immigrants standing on a queue

summaries.title: Davido para as three die for Osun local government crisis
summaries.description: Osun state Govnor Ademola Adeleke accuse a former govnor of di state Gboyega Oyetola say e dey plan to cause kasala for di state on Monday.
summaries.imageAlt: Ademola Adeleke, Gboyega Oyetola and Davido

summaries.title: European leaders meet for Paris for emergency summit on Ukraine
summaries.description: French President Emmanuel Macron dey host European leaders for Paris for urgent talks on Ukraine future.

summaries.title: Wetin dey happun for Lagos State House of Assembly
summaries.description: Video online show as Lagos state assembly, speaker Mojisola Meranda enta into the building wit some security officials wey dey protect di building

summaries.title: World 'first openly gay imam' shot dead for South Africa
summaries.description: Im establish The Inner Circle, one organisation wey dey provide support and safe space for gay Muslims, bifor im establish di inclusive Masjidul Ghurbaah mosque.
summaries.imageAlt: A close-up of Imam Muhsin Hendricks wearing a white shirt and a green scarf draped over one shoulder. The shot was taken in 2016.

summaries.title: Accusations and counter-accusations between Binance executive and Nigeria goment - wetin we know
summaries.description: Gambaryan bin spend months for Nigeria detention facility sake of alleged money laundering.

summaries.title: Why police declare controversial singer Portable wanted
summaries.description: Portable by imsef don come out in recent times ontop social media dey appeal to Nigerians make dem help am beg Ogun state goment.

summaries.title: Ned Nwoko deny 'pregnancy, 7th wife marriage' report to Nollywood actress
summaries.description: Tori bin dey fly say di lawmaker wan marry actress Chika Ike as im seventh wife but im don deny di rumour.
summaries.imageAlt: Ned Nwoko wit Regina Daniels and Chika Ike

summaries.title: Pope dey face serious health situation - Vatican tok
summaries.description: Di Pope go remain for hospital for as long as necessary, di Vatican tok.

summaries.title: What next for Chidimma Adetshina mama as South Africa authorities detain am?
summaries.description: Home Affairs say dem withdraw Anabela Rungo South African documentation for September 2024 afta dem discover say she allegedly obtain am fraudulently.

summaries.title: 'I do 36 blood transfusions during pregnancy' - how pregnant woman survive blood disorder
summaries.description: Worldwide e get around 270 million pipo wey get thalassaemia, a blood disorder disease wey make one woman do 36 blood transfusions during her pregnancy.
summaries.imageAlt: Kinjal dey smile sitting cross-legged on a metal hospital bed wit a tube attached to her arm for a blood transfusion. Her baby daughter stand up for her lap

summaries.title: Watch how whale swallow one man briefly for southern Chile before e spit am out
summaries.description: One Venezuelan kayaker get experience of im life wen one humpback whale swallow am briefly as e bin dey paddle for di Strait of Magellan for southern Chile.
summaries.imageAlt: Adrián Simancas, 23-year-old Venezuelan, wear colourful, poncho wey get stripes.

summaries.title: Unizik expel student wey fight lecturer for viral video
summaries.description: Authorities of di Nnamdi Azikiwe University don expel one female student after dem say she assault one lecturer for di school.

summaries.title: E dey get harder to find a partner?
summaries.description: Dis year Valentine's Day don come again, so why pipo for so many places dey struggle to form a lasting relationship?
summaries.imageAlt: A man and a woman locking heads

summaries.title: Click here to join di channel
summaries.description: No dull yoursef, be di first to get latest tori, analysis, exclusive interviews and ogbonge coverage of Nigerian and International news from BBC News Pidgin, straight to your Whatsapp.

curations.title: BBC News Pidgin now dey on Whatsapp

summaries.title: How woman wey get male and female sex organs life change after she share her tori
summaries.description: For June 2024, BBC Pidgin tell di tori of a 32-year-old woman wey bin dey suffer from sexual differentiation disorder. Now, she share how tins don change after she bin share her tori.

summaries.title: 'I no fit poo-poo from di normal place again after my colostomy surgery sake of cancer'
summaries.description: Dem diagnose Tobiloba wit rectal cancer, adenocarcinoma for March 2022.

summaries.title: 'My eye don see sometin becos I get one breast' - Woman wey dey live wit Poland syndrome
summaries.description: Poland Syndrome na rare deformity of pikin for womb, absence of muscles, breast and nipple for di upper part of di body.
summaries.imageAlt: Foto of Titilope Akintola for her house

summaries.title: Meet 'Madam Rice' di Nigerian local rice miller wey her tori dey ginger pipo
summaries.description: 'Madam Rice' tori and journey of being a local rice miller dey ginger her and don make her popular for social media.

summaries.title: Tins to know as Ghana begin cholera vaccination afta 50 pipo die across di kontri
summaries.description: Data from di health service and ministry of health don show say di greater Accra, Eastern, Central, Ashanti and Western regions na di regions wey don record cases.

summaries.title: Why prosecutor declare former Ghana finance minister Ken Ofori-Atta wanted
summaries.description: Kissi Agyebeng say di former minister allegedly dey involved for many ogbonge deals under di former president Nana Akufo-Addo goment.

summaries.title: Shell ignore warnings of di 'wayo' about di clean-up - whistleblower tell BBC
summaries.description: Di oil giant dey face allegations say dem ignore warnings about di clean-up scheme wey dey based on corruption.
summaries.imageAlt: Pool of black oil in di palm of one man hand for Ogoni, Nigeria

summaries.title: Nigeria beat Ghana for corruption as island nation maintain status as least corrupt African kontri - CPI report
summaries.description: Dis latest report show say Ghana score 42 out 100 points and rank 80 out of 180. Wetin e mean be say Nigeria corrupt pass Ghana.

summaries.title: Who be Kim Sae-ron, di South Korean actress wey die at 24
summaries.description: Kim start her career as a child actor and she bin dey seen as one of di kontri most promising actresses.
summaries.imageAlt: Kim Sae-ron, one young woman wit long dark brown hair and brown eyes, stand for front of one purple wall on a red carpet.

summaries.title: Why Diddy dey sue TV network NBC for $100m
summaries.description: Rapper Sean "Diddy" Combs don file a $100m (£80.5m) lawsuit against pipo wey make one recent documentary about am, as im kotinu to face allegations of sexual assault.
summaries.imageAlt: Sean "Diddy" Combs speak during di Congressional Black Caucus Foundation Annual Legislative Conference National Town Hall on September 21, 2023 for Washington, DC

summaries.title: Who be Natasha Osawaru wey Tuface dey tok about?
summaries.description: All dis dey happun weeks afta Tuface announce im separation from Anie Macaulay Idibia, im wife of ova 10 years.

summaries.title: Wizkid, Mohbad, Qing Madi and odas artistes wey make 2025 Headies nomination list
summaries.description:
Headies release di full list of nominees for di 17th award ceremony on 12 February for dia Twitter handle.
Late Mohbad wey pipo sabi as Ilerioluwa Aloba bag three nominations dis year, almost two years afta im die in September 2023.
summaries.imageAlt: Mohbad, Qing Madi, Wizkid and Tiwa Savage

additionalText.plainText: All di latest enertainment tori from around di world

summaries.title: Real Madrid vs Manchester City, and oda fixtures for di Champions League knockout play-off second leg
summaries.description: Di two-leg Champions League knockout phase play-offs start dis week, Manchester City and Real Madrid dey among di 16 teams wey don dey hope to reach di last 16.
summaries.imageAlt: Harry Kane of Bayern Munich celebrate as im score im team second goal during di Uefa Champions League 2024/25 League Knockout Play-off First Leg match between Celtic FC and FC Bayern München for Celtic Park on February 12, 2025 in Glasgow, Scotland

summaries.title: Kendrick Lamar, Donald Trump, and celebs wey show for Super Bowl
summaries.description: Oda stars wey show for New Orleans include Jay-Z, Blue Ivy, Samuel L Jackson and Bradley Cooper.
summaries.imageAlt: Kendrick Lamar perform for Super Bowl

summaries.title: Chiefs or Eagles? Expert Super Bowl 59 predictions
summaries.description: We get Super Bowl 59 predictions from our BBC Sport team along wit TV analysts, current NFL players and even Hollywood stars.
summaries.imageAlt: Di Super Bowl trophy and Chiefs and Eagles helmets

summaries.title: Authorties launch investigation into death of 'Pooley' afta dem stab am during match violence
summaries.description: Di Ghana football association don postpone next round of league matches afta one fan die during stabbing incident for game between Nsoatreman and Kotoko

Instagram
